content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 57, "index": 22}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_button, I need to craft dark_oak_planks first. I can do this by moving the stripped_dark_oak_wood at slot 24 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 57, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}]
thought: I have now crafted dark_oak_planks. I will move them to an empty slot (eg., 11) in my inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 57, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}]
thought: I now need to craft the dark_oak_button. To do this, I will move 1 dark_oak_planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_button
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 57, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 63, "index": 29}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 23, "index": 36}]
thought: I have now crafted the dark_oak_button. I will move it to an empty slot (eg., 12) in my inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
